description_en:
Deeply cleanse your oily and acne-prone skin with **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**. This ultra-gentle, soap-free foaming cleanser is specially formulated to effectively remove impurities and excess sebum, leaving your skin clean and refreshed. Enjoy healthier, brighter skin with every use.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**:
â­ Use on the entire face, morning and evening.
â­ Gently massage onto wet skin to create a rich lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac Foaming Gel**:
â­ Contains Piroctone Olamine as an anti-bacterial and anti-fungal agent against excess sebum.
â­ Soap-free formula that is gentle on the skin.
â­ Effective cleanser that removes impurities and excess sebum.

#Uriage #Hyseac #FaceWash #OilySkin #Acne #SkinCare #Cleanser #BeautyProducts #SaudiArabia #HealthySkin

description_en:
Introducing the **Uriage DÃ©piderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**, a highly effective and well-tolerated formula designed to combat dark spots and dullness. This intensive serum features a unique composition to treat dark spots and uneven skin tone. At its core is the Mela Technology, a blend of pea extract, sucrose, enoxolone, and Uriage Thermal Water, complemented by Vitamin C and Niacinamide. Together, these ingredients work synergistically to fight dark spots. The inclusion of AHA provides exfoliating properties, further enhancing the product's efficacy. This intensive treatment not only corrects the appearance of dark spots but also refines skin texture, leading to a more even and radiant complexion. With a fragrance-free and non-comedogenic formula, it's suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

â­ Evens out skin tone and reduces the appearance of dark spots.
â­ Brightens the complexion and improves skin texture.
â­ Free from parabens, alcohol, and fragrances.
â­ Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage DÃ©piderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**:
â­ Apply the serum to the face, neck, and dÃ©colletÃ©.
â­ Use in the morning and/or evening.
â­ For best results, use UV protection after application.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage DÃ©piderm Intensive Care Anti-Dark Spot Serum**:
â­ Mela Technology (Pea Extract, Sucrose, Enoxolone, Uriage Thermal Water) to reduce hyperpigmentation.
â­ Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA) to exfoliate the skin and boost radiance.
â­ Vitamin C to lighten skin and even out tone.
â­ Niacinamide to reduce melanin transfer and unify skin tone.

#Uriage #Depiderm #Serum #Skincare #SkinBrightening #DarkSpots #VitaminC #AHAcid #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

Discover the revitalizing power of **Uriage Depiwhite Eye Contour Cream**, designed to combat dark circles and puffiness for a visibly refreshed look. This advanced formula works to decongest, smooth, and brighten the delicate eye area, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Experience an immediate energizing effect and a more radiant, rested gaze.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Depiwhite Eye Contour Cream**:
â­ Apply every morning and evening to the eye contour area.
â­ Gently pat the cream into the skin for optimal absorption.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Depiwhite Eye Contour Cream**:
â­ Active ingredient complex to decongest puffiness and lighten dark circles.
â­ Moisturizing and smoothing ingredients to reduce wrinkles and fine lines.
â­ Hypoallergenic and fragrance-free formula, suitable for sensitive skin.

description_en:
Discover **URIAGE Ds Shampoo Moderate Anti-Dandruff 200ML**, the ideal solution for a healthy scalp and flake-free hair. This innovative shampoo combines the power of Uriage Thermal Water with effective ingredients to gently and efficiently treat dandruff, leaving your hair with the smoothness and cleanliness it deserves.

â­ Effectively reduces both dry and oily dandruff.
â­ Relieves itching and irritation associated with dandruff.
â­ Provides superior softness and a healthy, clean appearance to hair.
â­ Gentle enough for daily use to prevent dandruff recurrence.
â­ Enriched with Uriage Thermal Water to soothe the scalp.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE Ds Shampoo Moderate Anti-Dandruff 200ML**

â­ Apply to wet hair.
â­ Gently massage into the scalp and hair to create a rich lather.
â­ Leave on for a few minutes, then rinse thoroughly.
â­ Use regularly for optimal results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE Ds Shampoo Moderate Anti-Dandruff 200ML**

â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Piroctone Olamine as an active anti-dandruff agent.
â­ Soap-free formula, gentle on the scalp.
â­ Mild cleansing agents.

Say goodbye to stubborn dandruff with **Uriage Ds Hair Shampoo**, specially formulated to treat severe dandruff and intense itching. Its unique formula purifies your scalp and leaves your hair beautifully shiny and healthy.

â­ Effectively treats severe dandruff.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Ds Hair Shampoo**:
â­ Use twice a week for three weeks, then once a week to maintain results.

description_en:
Experience superior sun protection with **Uriage BariÃ©sun Cream Fragrance-Free**. This high-performance sunscreen offers very high protection against UVA and UVB rays, free radicals, and prevents skin dryness, thanks to its advanced formula and Uriage Thermal Water.

**Product Features:**
â­ Light, non-greasy texture for ultimate comfort.
â­ Water-resistant for continuous and reliable coverage.
â­ Absorbs quickly, leaving skin smooth.
â­ Hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
â­ Fragrance-free for a gentle application experience.
â­ Prevents photoaging by reinforcing the skin barrier and protecting DNA from UV damage.
â­ Provides broad-spectrum coverage and photostability against UVB and UVA rays.
â­ Intensely moisturizes the skin with Aquaspongines and soothing Thermal Water.

**Results:**
â­ 100% pleasant skin texture!

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©sun Cream Fragrance-Free**:
â­ Before sun exposure, apply a generous and even layer to cover the exposed area.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or toweling dry.
â­ Reduce sun exposure as much as possible, even with protection.
â­ Avoid direct sun exposure for babies and young children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©sun Cream Fragrance-Free**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Naturally rich in soothing and invigorating minerals that strengthen the skin barrier and reduce inflammation.
â­ Aquaspongines: Provides intense hydration and protects against dehydration.
â­ Latest-generation filters: Offer very high protection against UVB and UVA rays.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #BariÃ©sun #Moisturizer #Beauty #HealthySkin #FragranceFree #SkinHealth

description_en:
Discover superior sun protection with **Uriage BariÃ©sun Fragrance-free Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream**. This advanced formula provides very high protection against UVA, UVB rays, and free radicals, while preventing skin dryness. Its light, non-greasy, and water-resistant texture ensures a pleasant user experience with every application. This highly fluid cream guarantees high safety, excellent tolerance, and rapid absorption, making it ideal for sensitive, non-comedogenic skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©sun Fragrance-free Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream**:
â­ Apply an even layer to the skin 30 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every 2 hours, or after swimming or sweating.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©sun Fragrance-free Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Fights sun damage, strengthens the skin barrier, and protects DNA from UV damage.
â­ Latest-generation filters: Provide maximum photostable protection against UVB-UVA rays.
â­ Aquaspongines: Ensure intense moisturization and protection against dehydration.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate solution for your skin with **Uriage BariÃ©derm Cica Cream**, specially formulated to repair damaged and irritated skin with its unique formula that combines insulation, repair, and soothing.

âœ¨ **Uriage BariÃ©derm Cica Cream** excels in its superior ability to insulate and protect the skin, creating an ideal environment for skin recovery. It also works to soothe irritation and promote the repair process. It's the perfect cream for fragile skin that has been subjected to various forms of aggression such as itching, overheating, or after dermo-aesthetic procedures.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©derm Cica Cream**:
â­ Apply twice a day to skin that has been previously cleansed with BariÃ©derm Cica-Gel cleanser.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©derm Cica Cream**:
â­ Zinc Oxide: For protection and skin soothing.
â­ Panthenol (Vitamin B5): To promote repair and skin hydration.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: For deep hydration and restoring skin elasticity.
â­ Organic Silicon: To form a protective barrier on the skin.

description_en:
Discover the gentle yet effective cleansing power of **Uriage Xemose Cleanser** for Face & Body. Specially formulated for very dry and eczema-prone skin, this soothing gel-cream provides daily cleansing with a creamy foam that purifies without irritation. Experience immediate comfort and lasting protection against dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Xemose Cleanser**:
â­ Gently massage the gel onto wet skin to lather.
â­ Rinse thoroughly.
â­ Pat skin dry gently.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Xemose Cleanser**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water, naturally rich in minerals and trace elements, soothes the driest skin.
â­ Extra-gentle cleansing base removes impurities from the skin without irritating it, thanks to its physiological pH.
â­ Specific superfatting agents combined with the patented Cerasterol-2F complex protect against the drying effect of water and restore comfort to the skin.

#Uriage #Xemose #DrySkinCleanser #EczemaTreatment #SkinMoisture #SaudiSkincare #UriageProducts #HealthySkin #SaudiBeauty #FaceCare

title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ø­Ù…Ø¶ Ø§Ù„Ù‡ÙŠØ§Ù„ÙˆØ±ÙˆÙ†ÙŠÙƒ Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù‚ÙŠ 1.5% - Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ù…Ù…ØªÙ„Ø¦Ø© ÙˆÙ…Ø±Ø·Ø¨Ø© Ù„Ù…Ø¯Ø© 24 Ø³Ø§Ø¹Ø©
description_en:
Discover the secret to plump, radiant skin with the **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**. This advanced booster serum is your ultimate solution for deep hydration and a lasting natural glow. Formulated with a potent 1.5% concentration of pure and natural Hyaluronic Acid, it creates a protective film on the skin's surface, smoothing fine dehydration lines and leaving your complexion luminous and peachy-soft.

Experience visible results with **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**: it hydrates, plumps, and smoothens your skin for an impressive 86%* skin plumping effect. Its fresh, light texture is easily absorbed and simple to apply with the convenient dropper. Enriched with Marshmallow Flower for added hydration and antioxidant benefits, plus a patented complex that stimulates your skin's natural defenses. Enjoy a delightful sensory fragrance of Bergamot and Peach with a hint of Cedarwood. Suitable for all skin types, even sensitive, this serum is non-sticky and non-greasy. **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%** is your perfect daily skincare companion.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**:
â­ Apply a few drops of the serum to cleansed skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ Use daily, morning and evening, before your moisturizer.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyaluronic Acid Booster Serum 1.5%**:
â­ 1.5% Pure & Natural Hyaluronic Acid.
â­ Marshmallow Flower.
â­ Patented Complex.
â­ 97% ingredients of natural origin.
â­ Paraben-free.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

#Uriage #HyaluronicAcid #SkinHydration #Skincare #HealthySkin #RadiantSkin #DehydrationTreatment #AntiAging #SkincareProducts #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Provide ultimate protection for your child's delicate skin with **Uriage BariÃ©sun Kids Sunscreen Spray**. This very high protection spray against UVB-UVA-Blue Light is water-resistant, keeping sensitive children's skin safe.

Uriage Thermal Water, at the core of BariÃ©sun formulas, helps fight the harmful effects of the sun, reinforcing your child's skin barrier and protecting DNA from UV damage.

â­ Very high protection against UVB-UVA-Blue Light
â­ Water-resistant for sensitive children's skin
â­ Reinforces skin barrier and protects DNA from damage
â­ Non-sticky and easily absorbed
â­ Does not sting your eyes
â­ Tested under dermatological control
â­ Made in France for quality assurance

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©sun Kids Sunscreen Spray**:
â­ Apply a sufficient dose of product before exposure (e.g., 8 calf sprays per area).
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after sweating, swimming, or wiping.
â­ Even when well protected, minimize direct sun exposure.
â­ Do not expose babies and young children directly to the sun.
â­ Shake well before use for even distribution.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©sun Kids Sunscreen Spray**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water for soothing and hydration.
â­ Advanced UVB-UVA filtering complex with Tinosorb M.
â­ Antioxidant Vitamins C and E for extra protection.
â­ Aquaspongines for deep and lasting hydration.
â­ Hypoallergenic formula to minimize the risk of allergic reactions.

description_en:
Experience superior protection with **Uriage BariÃ©sun Dry Mist SPF50+**.

**Uriage BariÃ©sun Dry Mist SPF50+** is a very high protection sunscreen (SPF 50+) specially formulated to shield your skin.

Product Features:
â­ Very high protection against UVA/UVB rays and free radicals.
â­ Enriched with Uriage Thermal Water and Aquaspongines to prevent skin dryness.
â­ Contains Vitamins C and E for added protection against photo-aging.
â­ Ultra-light, invisible, and quickly absorbed texture for a dry, non-sticky finish.
â­ Waterproof and suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Provides a refreshing effect, ideal for outdoor activities.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©sun Dry Mist SPF50+**:
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Before sun exposure, spray generously on exposed skin.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after sweating, swimming, or towel-drying, to maintain protection.
â­ Do not spray directly onto the face; spray into your palm first, then apply to the face.
â­ Minimize sun exposure even with sunscreen. Do not expose babies and young children to direct sunlight.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©sun Dry Mist SPF50+**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Aquaspongines.
â­ Vitamin C & E.
â­ Latest-generation filters for UVA/UVB protection.

description_en:
Achieve clear, mattified skin with **Uriage Hyseac 3-Regul+ Global Anti-Blemish Care**. This all-in-one formula works to eliminate skin imperfections such as spots, blackheads, and shine, leaving your skin clear and mattified. Enriched with AHA, Zinc, and Uriage Thermal Water, it purifies and tightens pores, while Liquorice extract helps control excess sebum to prevent new blemishes. 

â­ Limits spots and blackheads thanks to a high-performance complex of active ingredients and Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Refines skin texture and visibly tightens pores.
â­ Mattifies by limiting excess sebum, the source of new blemishes, thanks to Liquorice extract.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Oil-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac 3-Regul+ Global Anti-Blemish Care**
â­ Apply morning and/or evening to thoroughly cleansed, dried skin.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ Tested on acne-prone skin.
â­ For daily use.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac 3-Regul+ Global Anti-Blemish Care**
â­ Uriage Thermal Water
â­ Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA)
â­ Zinc
â­ Liquorice Extract

description_en:
Discover ultimate protection with **Uriage BariÃ©sun Sun Lotion SPF50+**. Thanks to its high-performance filtering complex, this lotion provides very high protection against UVA and UVB rays, free radicals, and prevents skin from drying out. Its light, non-greasy, and pleasantly fragranced texture guarantees renewed pleasure of use each time it's applied. **Uriage BariÃ©sun Sun Lotion SPF50+** ensures high safety, high tolerance, and rapid absorption, making it the ideal choice for your skin.

Product Benefits:
â­ Prevents photoaging.
â­ Uriage Thermal Water, at the core of BariÃ©sun formulas, fights against the harmful effects of the sun, reinforcing the skin barrier and protecting DNA from UV damage.
â­ Protects against UV rays with its new complex of latest-generation filters providing very high protection, proven photostability, and broad UVB and UVA coverage.
â­ Intensely moisturizes, enriched with Aquaspongines and Uriage Thermal Water, offering intense protection against dryness.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage BariÃ©sun Sun Lotion SPF50+**:
â­ Before exposure, apply a generous and even layer to cover the area exposed to the sun.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or toweling dry.
â­ Even though you are well protected, reduce exposure as much as possible.
â­ Do not expose babies and young children directly to the sun.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage BariÃ©sun Sun Lotion SPF50+**:
â­ Advanced formula with high-performance filters for broad-spectrum protection.
â­ Uriage Thermal Water to soothe and moisturize the skin.
â­ Aquaspongines for intense hydration and protection against dryness.
â­ Light, non-greasy, and delicately fragranced.
â­ Hypoallergenic.
â­ Non-comedogenic.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #Skincare #SunProtection #Moisturizing #HealthySkin #SkinHealth #Beauty #DailyCare #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Discover the power of **Uriage Age Lift Eye Cream**, the ultimate solution for firming and smoothing the delicate eye area. This advanced cream expertly blends retinol and hyaluronic acid to provide superior care for all skin types, effectively reducing the appearance of wrinkles, puffiness, and dark circles. Revitalize your eye contour with **Uriage Age Lift Eye Cream** and enjoy a more rested, radiant look. Ophthalmologically tested for maximum safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Age Lift Eye Cream**:
â­ Gently apply to the eye contour area in the morning and/or evening.
â­ Massage lightly until fully absorbed.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Age Lift Eye Cream**:
â­ Retinol: Aids in skin cell renewal and reduces signs of aging.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: Deeply hydrates and plumps fine lines and wrinkles.
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Soothes and moisturizes the skin.

#Uriage #EyeCare #AntiAging #Retinol #HyaluronicAcid #EyeFirming #EyeSmoothing #DarkCircles #EyeWrinkles #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Experience immediate relief with **Uriage Xemose Anti-Itch Soothing Oil Balm** , the ultimate solution for dry skin prone to atopic eczema. It soothes the skin from the first application and provides 48-hour protection against dryness recurrence, making it ideal for daily use on the face and body. Thanks to its nourishing, fragrance-free formula, this balm transforms into an oil that deeply nourishes and leaves a non-sticky protective barrier for lasting comfort. Backed by four patents and 10% Shea Butter, **Uriage Xemose** strengthens the skin's natural barrier and enhances microbiome balance with ceramides, offering superior and safe care for the whole family, even newborns. Dermatologist recommended, it is ultra-gentle and suitable for cancer patients, free from parabens.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Xemose Anti-Itch Soothing Oil Balm**
â­ Apply morning and/or evening to cleansed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Xemose Anti-Itch Soothing Oil Balm**
â­ Enriched with 10% Shea Butter for deep nourishment.
â­ Contains Ceramides to strengthen the skin barrier.
â­ Backed by 4 patents.
â­ Fragrance-free and Paraben-free.
â­ High-tolerance formula.

title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ¬ Ù‡Ø§ÙŠØ³Ø§Ùƒ Ø³ÙŠØ±ÙˆÙ… Ù†ÙŠÙˆ Ø³ÙƒÙŠÙ†: Ù…Ø¹Ø²Ø² Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„Ù„Ø´ÙˆØ§Ø¦Ø¨ Ù„Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ù†Ù‚ÙŠØ© 30 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Uriage Hyseac New Skin Serum Anti-Blemish Booster 30 ml is your ultimate solution for blemish-prone, oily skin. This innovative serum works to purify the skin, reduce the appearance of imperfections, and refine skin texture, leaving you with visibly healthy, clear, and blemish-free skin. Specially formulated for combination-to-oily and acne-prone skin, it helps combat stress-induced imperfections like blemishes, blackheads, enlarged pores, and even fine lines.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Hyseac New Skin Serum**:
â­ Apply morning and evening before your daily skincare routine.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.
â­ This product contains AHAs, so use sun protection in case of sun exposure.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Hyseac New Skin Serum**:
â­ Aqua (Water, Eau) â€¢ Alcohol Denat, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate â€¢ 1,2-Hexanediol â€¢ Diglycerin
â­ Glycolic Acid â€¢ Malic Acid â€¢ Lactic Acid â€¢ Propanediol
â­ Sodium Hydroxide â€¢ Xanthan Gum â€¢ Butylene Glycol
â­ Parfum (Fragrance) â€¢ Phytosphingosine â€¢ Pentylene Glycol â€¢ Zinc Lactate â€¢ Sclerotium Gum
â­ Algin â€¢ Achillea Millefolium Extract â€¢ Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract â€¢ Rhamnose â€¢ Glucose â€¢ Glucuronic Acid.

title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ¬ Ø²ÙŠÙ…ÙˆØ² Ø³ÙŠØ±Ø§Øª Ù…Ø¶Ø§Ø¯ Ù„ØªÙ‡ÙŠØ¬ Ø§Ù„Ø¨Ø´Ø±Ø© Ø§Ù„Ø¬Ø§ÙØ© Ø¬Ø¯Ø§Ù‹ 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
The **Uriage Xemose Cerat Anti-Irritation for Very Dry Skin** is formulated for extra dry skin prone to atopic eczema with 25% Shea Butter. This extra-rich melting cerat soothes itching sensations and deeply nourishes. Ideal for face and body, it is fragrance-free and works to calm irritated, very dry skin, deeply moisturizes and softens, effectively reduces itching, and helps prevent future dryness and irritation. It is safe for babies, children, and adults, and developed with dermatologists, making it suitable for eczema-prone and sensitive skin.

â­ Provides anti-irritation care for very dry skin prone to atopic eczema.
â­ Deeply hydrates the skin with 25% Shea Butter, leaving it soft and soothed.
â­ Significantly reduces irritation and itching, soothing the skin for immediate comfort.
â­ Safe for use on face and body, suitable for babies, children, and adults.
â­ Developed and recommended by dermatologists, fragrance-free, and non-comedogenic.

#UriageXemose #Skincare #DrySkin #Eczema #Hydration #BodyCare #BeautyProducts #RiyadhBeauty #SaudiSkincare #Dermatology

â­ Apply daily on clean skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Xemose Cerat Anti-Irritation for Very Dry Skin**:
â­ 25% Shea Butter
â­ Fragrance-free formula
â­ Supported by 3 patents for triple barrier action

description_en:
Uriage Bariesun SPF50+ Anti Brown Spot Fluid is your ultimate defense against pigmentation. 

This fluid combines a high-performance filter complex and two dermatological patents to protect the skin, prevent cellular damage and photoaging caused by UVA, UVB rays, and blue light. 

The very high protection fluid of **Uriage Bariesun SPF50+ Anti Brown Spot Fluid** helps prevent the appearance of brown spots and protects areas treated with dermatological procedures. Its corrective action reduces pigmentation flaws and evens out the complexion.

â­ Prevents cellular damage and photoaging with Skin Shield technology.
â­ Optimizes photoprotection with the [BARIESUN] patent.
â­ Corrects and prevents brown spots with its active ingredient formula.
â­ Eco-friendly approach with eco-designed packaging.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariesun SPF50+ Anti Brown Spot Fluid**:
â­ Apply a sufficient amount of product before sun exposure (e.g., the equivalent of a teaspoon for the face and neck).
â­ Reducing this amount reduces the level of protection.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after perspiring, swimming, or towelling dry.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Bariesun SPF50+ Anti Brown Spot Fluid**:
â­ Aqua (Water, Eau)
â­ Dicaprylyl Carbonate
â­ Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol [Nano]
â­ Ethylhexyl Triazone
â­ Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane
â­ Dimethicone
â­ Diisopropyl Sebacate
â­ And other active ingredients for your skin's comfort and protection.

#Uriage #Bariesun #Sunscreen #AntiBrownSpot #Skincare #HealthySkin #Moisturizing #Beauty #SkinLightening #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Discover ultimate protection with **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Invisible Sunscreen Spray SPF50+, Fragrance-Free**, a high-protection sunscreen specifically designed for sensitive skin. It offers broad-spectrum protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays, protecting the skin from free radicals and preventing dehydration. With its lightweight, fast-absorbing, and non-greasy formula, this sunscreen is ideal for daily use, providing a feeling of freshness and protection all day long.

â­ Very high protection against UVA, UVB, and blue light.
â­ Prevents cellular damage and photoaging.
â­ Hydrates skin by +65% in 30 minutes.
â­ Fast-absorbing with no greasy or white cast.
â­ Water-resistant and suitable for use after sweating, swimming, or towel-drying.
â­ Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and paraben-free.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Invisible Sunscreen Spray SPF50+, Fragrance-Free**:
â­ Shake the can well before use.
â­ Spray generously onto exposed skin at least 20 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply every two hours, or after swimming, sweating, or towel-drying.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Invisible Sunscreen Spray SPF50+, Fragrance-Free**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water for deep hydration and protection.
â­ Organic filters for broad-spectrum protection.
â­ Aquaspongines to enhance skin hydration.
â­ Vitamin E for antioxidant action.

#Uriage #BariÃ©sun #Sunscreen #InvisibleSunscreen #SPF50 #Skincare #FragranceFree #WaterResistant #SunProtection #SaudiBeauty

description_en:
Introducing the **Uriage Depiderm** Brightening Corrective Serum, a delicately scented serum designed to deliver potent corrective action for a revitalized complexion. This advanced serum works to visibly reduce the appearance of dark spots, promoting a radiant and even-toned complexion. 

**Uriage Depiderm** features a unique blend of active ingredients that smoothens skin features and visibly diminishes wrinkles and fine lines, revealing a younger, more vibrant look. The concentrate delivers essential hydration, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and comfortable throughout the day. Its hypoallergenic formula ensures excellent tolerance, making it suitable for all skin types.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Depiderm**:
â­ Apply morning and evening to cleansed skin after a toning lotion and before your regular skincare routine.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Depiderm**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Naturally rich with soothing and invigorating minerals that reinforce the skin's barrier.
â­ ACTIWHITE: Helps to reduce dark spots and even out skin tone.
â­ Combination of Active Ingredients: To smooth skin features and visibly diminish wrinkles and fine lines.
â­ Hydrating Ingredients: To deliver the necessary hydration, leaving skin revitalized and comfortable.

Introducing the **Uriage Gyn-Phy Intimate Area Spray 50 ml**, your gentle solution for cleansing, refreshing, and soothing the intimate area while respecting its natural balance. Enriched with Uriage Thermal Water and lactic acid, this spray helps maintain the physiological pH, alleviating discomfort and promoting a feeling of lasting comfort. Experience immediate freshness and well-being.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Gyn-Phy Intimate Area Spray 50 ml**:
â­ Spray directly onto the external part of the intimate area.
â­ Gently wipe off.
â­ Do not rinse.
â­ Avoid contact with the eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Gyn-Phy Intimate Area Spray 50 ml**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water.
â­ Lactic Acid.
â­ GLYCO-GYN cleansing complex.
â­ Soap-free formula.
â­ Suitable for sensitive skin.
â­ pH 5.5.
â­ Clinically tested under gynecological supervision.

description_en:
Experience refreshing comfort with **Uriage Bariederm Cica Cleansing Gel**. This fresh, fragrance-free foaming gel is specifically formulated to soothe irritated skin and promote long-term recovery, making it an ideal choice for weakened skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariederm Cica Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Lather the gel with water and apply to damp skin.
â­ Gently massage to cleanse the skin.
â­ Rinse thoroughly with water.
â­ Gently pat dry without rubbing.
â­ Use morning and evening for best results.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Bariederm Cica Cleansing Gel**:
â­ Formulated with Copper and Zinc to purify the skin and limit the risk of bacterial proliferation.
â­ Soap-free and fragrance-free formulation to avoid further irritation.
â­ Physiological pH compatible with the skin.
â­ Developed and recommended by dermatologists.

description_en:
Discover **Uriage HysÃ©ac Purifying Peel-off Mask**, the ultimate solution for oily and blemish-prone skin. This mask deeply purifies the skin, tightens pores, and refines skin texture, leaving you with clear and pristine skin. Its formula, enriched with Kaolin and Zinc, effectively absorbs excess sebum and reduces imperfections. Pores are visibly tightened, and skin texture is instantly refined for a smoother, softer feel. Enjoy clearer, more radiant, and beautiful skin with regular use.

â­ Visibly clearer skin with remarkable radiance and beauty.
â­ Tested on oily and blemish-prone skin.
â­ Non-comedogenic.
â­ Made in France.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage HysÃ©ac Purifying Peel-off Mask**:
â­ Apply a thin layer to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye area and hairline.
â­ Leave on for 15 minutes until completely dry, then gently peel off from the bottom upwards.
â­ Use once a week.
â­ Do not use on sensitive or irritated skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage HysÃ©ac Purifying Peel-off Mask**:
â­ Kaolin (for superior sebum absorption).
â­ Zinc (for purifying and soothing the skin).

description_en:
Experience superior sun protection with **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Moisturizing Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream for Face**. This advanced formula provides very high protection against UVA, UVB rays, and free radicals, preventing skin dryness with its nourishing composition. Featuring next-generation filters for maximum photoprotection and stability, Uriage Thermal Water combined with Aquaspongines intensely moisturizes and strengthens the skin's protective barrier. Enjoy the pleasure of reapplication with its light, non-greasy, and delicately fragranced texture that absorbs quickly for high safety and tolerance.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Moisturizing Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream for Face**:
â­ Before sun exposure, apply a generous and even layer to cover the exposed area.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or towel-drying.
â­ Reduce sun exposure duration as much as possible, even with sun protection.
â­ Avoid direct sun exposure for babies and young children.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE BariÃ©sun Moisturizing Sunscreen SPF50+ Cream for Face**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: Soothes and reinforces the skin barrier.
â­ Advanced Filters: Offer very high protection against UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Aquaspongines: Provide intense hydration and protection against dehydration.
â­ Vitamin E: Acts as an antioxidant.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #Skincare #Moisturizing #SPF50 #HealthySkin #FaceCare #BeautyProducts #SunProtection #SaudiArabia

description_en:
Reveal your skin's revitalized potential with **Uriage Age Protect Night Peel**. This innovative night cream, rich in fruit acids (AHA), gently and safely exfoliates your skin as you sleep, leaving it incredibly smooth and radiant. It effectively targets signs of aging like wrinkles and sagging, thanks to its unique formula combining Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamins C & E, and Dragon's Blood extract. Uriage's patented technology provides ultimate protection against environmental aggressors and blue light.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Age Protect Night Peel**:
â­ Apply once or twice a week before bedtime on perfectly cleansed skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Age Protect Night Peel**:
â­ Fruit Acids (AHA) for gentle exfoliation and skin cell renewal.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C & E to fill wrinkles and restore skin elasticity.
â­ Dragon's Blood Extract for skin regeneration and protection.
â­ Formula to combat blue light and harmful environmental factors.

#Uriage #Skincare #NightPeel #AntiAging #SkinMoisture #RadiantSkin #BeautyProducts #Cosmetics #HealthySkin #SaudiArabia

This lightweight moisturizing jelly is perfect for normal and combination skin, providing deep hydration and a natural radiance. Enriched with the benefits of Uriage's Thermal Water, it works to protect your skin from harmful external factors and reduce dryness, leaving it soft, supple, and refreshed. An unparalleled hydration experience for healthy, glowing skin.

â­ Delivers deep skin hydration.
â­ Ideal for normal and combination skin.

description_en:
Discover the ultimate solution for combating skin aging with **Uriage Age Protect Intensive Night Detox Cream**. This innovative night cream shields your skin from the effects of blue light and harmful environmental factors, helping to regenerate skin cells and reduce signs of fatigue and stress. Its rich formula, packed with antioxidants, retinol, and vitamin C, works to fight wrinkles and loss of skin firmness, enhanced by dragon's blood extract and hyaluronic acid. It features proven effectiveness in protecting the skin from pollution and activating its natural detox system, giving you younger, more radiant skin.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Age Protect Intensive Night Detox Cream**:
â­ Apply the cream every evening on perfectly cleansed and dry skin.
â­ Gently massage until fully absorbed.
â­ For best results, use regularly.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Age Protect Intensive Night Detox Cream**:
â­ Retinol (for regeneration and anti-wrinkle action)
â­ Hyaluronic Acid (for hydration and plumping fine lines)
â­ Vitamin C & Vitamin E (as powerful antioxidants)
â­ Dragon's Blood Extract (for protection and renewal)
â­ Other ingredients for blue light and environmental protection.

#Uriage #SkinCare #AntiAging #BlueLightProtection #SkinRegeneration #Retinol #VitaminC #HealthySkin #Beauty #SaudiArabia

description_en:
The **Uriage Bariederm Cica Spray 100ml** is the ultimate solution for soothing and repairing damaged and irritated skin resulting from superficial cuts, minor burns, and scratches. This innovative spray helps to moisturize and protect the skin's natural barrier, reducing dryness and providing immediate relief. Its unique formula is rich in Uriage Thermal Water, fast-absorbing, and fragrance-free, making it suitable for the entire family, including babies in the diaper area. It grants you healthy and renewed skin thanks to its effective ingredients.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariederm Cica Spray**:
â­ Apply twice daily to damaged and irritated skin.
â­ Suitable for use on the face, body, and diaper area.
â­ Shake well before use.
â­ Ideal after minor surgical procedures or as complementary care.
â­ Easy to use and fast-acting.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Bariederm Cica Spray**:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water: For soothing and calming the skin.
â­ Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide: To provide a protective barrier for the skin.
â­ Hyaluronic Acid: For deep hydration and cell renewal.
â­ Copper Gluconate and Zinc Gluconate: To aid in the skin healing process.
â­ Glycerin: For added moisture and softness.

#Uriage #Bariederm #CicaSpray #Skincare #SkinMoisture #HealthySkin #BurnCare #WoundCare #SaudiBeauty #FaceCare

description_en:
Experience ultimate comfort with **URIAGE XEMOSE Cream**, the nourishing and protective moisturizer specifically formulated for dry, very dry, and eczema-prone skin. This cream instantly soothes itching sensations that lead to scratching, providing long-lasting relief. Its melting, non-sticky texture absorbs rapidly, allowing you to get dressed immediately after application without any discomfort. **URIAGE XEMOSE Cream** helps reduce severe dryness, restoring your skin's suppleness and softness for a comfortable, smooth feel all day long.

â­ Soothes itch that induces scratching effectively.
â­ Modulates the skin's innate defense barrier and reduces peaks of dryness.
â­ Brings an instant soothing action, thanks to the patented Chronoxine.
â­ Leaves skin supple and soft to the touch.
â­ Skin regains long-lasting comfort and suppleness.
â­ Offers a non-greasy and non-sticky finish.
â­ Penetrates rapidly without leaving any greasy residue.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE XEMOSE Cream**:
â­ Apply daily on clean, dry skin.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE XEMOSE Cream**:
â­ This product offers exceptional comfort with its rich formulation.
â­ Features ingredients designed to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin.

description_en:
Introducing the **URIAGE Bariesun Mattifying Sunscreen SPF50+**, your ultimate protection for combination to oily skin.

â­ Provides high protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays.
â­ Features a mattifying and anti-shine formula that absorbs excess sebum and reduces the appearance of pores.
â­ Moisturizes and combats skin aging with Uriage Thermal Water and Hyaluronic Acid to hydrate and plump the skin.
â­ A non-comedogenic and oil-free fluid, perfect for oily and combination skin types.
â­ Hypoallergenic and fragrance-free, tested under dermatological control for maximum safety and efficacy.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **URIAGE Bariesun Mattifying Sunscreen SPF50+**:
â­ Apply generously and evenly to the face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.
â­ Reapply frequently, especially after swimming, sweating, or towel drying.
â­ Avoid contact with eyes.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **URIAGE Bariesun Mattifying Sunscreen SPF50+**:
â­ Aqua (Water, Eau), Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Nylon12, Octocrylene, Pentaerythrityl Distearate, Steareth2, Steareth21, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Tromethamine, Parfum (Fragrance), Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, OCymen5Ol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Citric Acid.

description_en:
Achieve clean and refreshed skin with the Uriage Thermal Make Up Remover. Specially formulated for oily and combination skin, it effectively acts like a magnet to remove makeup and impurities, thanks to its unique formula enriched with thermal water. It purifies the skin with green apple extract and Power Refiner, helping to regulate sebum secretion for balanced skin. It also protects your skin from dehydration with the moisturizing benefits of Uriage Thermal Water.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage** Thermal Make Up Remover For Oily & Combination Skin:
â­ Apply an adequate amount of the product onto a dry cotton pad.
â­ Gently wipe over your skin to remove makeup and dirt.
â­ No need to rinse with water.
â­ Re-close the package securely.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage** Thermal Make Up Remover For Oily & Combination Skin:
â­ Uriage Thermal Water for deep hydration.
â­ Green apple extract for skin purification.
â­ Power Refiner complex to regulate sebum secretion.
â­ Soft, non-ionic, anti-stress agents for gentle makeup removal.

#Uriage #MakeupRemover #OilySkin #CombinationSkin #SkinCleanser #Skincare #MicellarWater #SaudiBeauty #BeautyProducts #HealthySkin

title_ar: ÙŠÙˆØ±ÙŠØ§Ø¬ Ø¨Ø§Ø±ÙŠ ØµÙ† Ø³Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ù‰ Ø²ÙŠØª Ø¬Ø§Ù ÙˆØ§Ù‚Ù‰ Ù„Ù„Ø´Ù…Ø³ (SPF 50+) 200 Ù…Ù„
description_en:
Experience superior protection with **Uriage Bariesun Dry Oil Spray SPF50+**. Thanks to a high-performance filtering complex, this dry oil provides high protection against UVA and UVB rays and free radicals, preventing skin from drying out. It leaves your skin satin-smooth and illuminates your tan with its vanishing, melt-in, and non-greasy texture. It can also be used on hair, protecting it against dryness and preserving its natural beauty.

ğŸ”¹ Usage Instructions for **Uriage Bariesun Dry Oil Spray SPF50+**:
â­ Spray a generous and even layer onto the body and hair before any sun exposure.
â­ Reapply regularly, especially after perspiring, swimming, or toweling dry.
â­ Even though you are well protected, reduce exposure as much as possible.
â­ Do not expose babies and young children directly to the sun.

ğŸ”¹ Ingredients of **Uriage Bariesun Dry Oil Spray SPF50+**:
â­ High-performance filtering complex for broad-spectrum protection.
â­ Moisturizing ingredients to prevent skin dryness.
â­ Oil with a silky, non-greasy finish.

#Uriage #Sunscreen #DryOil #Skincare #SunProtection #HealthySkin #Summer #Moisturizing #BeautyProducts #HairCare
